long.para: isnilpotent(X, tol) returns logical 1 (true) for array elements that are nilpotents (square to zero)
The second parameter specifies a tolerance. If omitted the default is a small multiple of eps (see code).

references.reference: Stephen J. Sangwine and Daniel Alfsmann, 'Determination of the Biquaternion Divisors of Zero, Including the Idempotents and Nilpotents', Advances in Applied Clifford Algebras, 20, (2010), 401–410. 10.1007/s00006-010-0202-3.
